search_results.title: In Conversation: LVRA
search_results.snippet: I don't think LVRA does either but it's just something I've stuck with. You live in Edinburgh, study in Oxford, and have parents from Shanghai.

search_results.title: LVRA
search_results.snippet: LVRA has never allowed boundaries nor contraries to restrict their creativity. Their latest EP, soft like steel, which released yesterday, ...

search_results.title: A CONVERSATION WITH... LVRA
search_results.snippet: There's LVRA, the path-forging and ever-stylish artist whose music leaves you with an adrenaline rush. Credit: Rachel Wonders.
